Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with a thief called Roko, the film takes place at the beginning of the Showa period when Japan just recently regained peace from World War I.
